name: Board to Death
description:
Hey Guys,

This game was done with the largest team I have ever worked with!

The team: Lisa Sijnstra(Me), Alexander(Developer), Dana Patrascoiu(Designer), Bogdan Arosculesei(Designer), Lotta Elstermann(Artist) and Jullie-San Croes(Artist).

The game is a simple platformer, designer with the smoothest animations and gameplay that we could manage.

You are trapped inside a chalkboard at school, alongside most of your friends! Now you have got to save them from despair! Use different abilities and get through the test-level!

Have fun!
